column5: I know that feeling since my dad is a doctor and he pressure me to do good so that I can be successful and he also had said that he doing this for me so I should know his pain.I feel so pressure to the point that I overthink of simple stuff.There been time I want to end it all but I know there people who still like for who I am.(Iâ€™m 17 btw and got one semester left graduate.)
